name: French Martini
recipeIngredient: 1/4 ounce Chambord Liqueur Royale de France

recipeInstructions.text: Line martini glass with green apples, with the skins coated with fleur de sel.
Mix vodka, Chambord and juice in a shaker with ice; chill and strain into glass. Shake cider till it foams and pour on top.
